channel.title: Ux on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Ux on Dwarves Foundation

item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: User experience (UX) research is the foundation of any successful digital product or service. UX research helps companies understand their users, their needs, and their pain points.

item.title: Design Sprint
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: What is the design sprint? The sprint is a four-day process for answering critical business questions through design, prototyping and testing ideas with customers.
